root: ^Flork: Sorry, I can’t come. I’m bedmaxxing right now.
^Tell him that the term is bedrotting

meaning: ^Flork: Yeah, it’s when I lay in bed and do nothing so hard I transcend mortal limits.
^Flork: To YOU. I, however, am so well rested I have become God.
rotting: ^Flork: Excuse you, I am not rotting. That would require me to be dead.
^You (Streamer): Well, aren’t you dead asleep most of the time?
interlude: ^You (Streamer): Don’t you ever get the desire to… y’know… go outside and touch grass?
health: ^You (Streamer): I hope you’re, uh, eating healthy at least.
exercise: ^You (Streamer): Do you exercise at least? Do some sort of, uh, physical activity?
^Flork: There’s gym equipment in the basement.
ending: ^You (Streamer): Well uh I hope you have a good day?? I think???
